name: Cappuccino
description: A cappuccino is an approximately 150 ml (5 oz) beverage, with 25 ml of espresso coffee and 85ml of fresh milk.  decadent coupling of rich intense espresso, creamy, frothed milk and deep, dark chocolate..

name: Espresso Cuppuccino
description: A traditional cappuccino has an even distribution of espresso, steamed milk, and foamed milk. A latte has more steamed milk and a light layer of foam. A cappuccino is distinctly layered, while in a latte the espresso and steamed milk are mixed together.
